title: WhatsApp for iOS now supports up to 32 participants group voice calls, reactions coming soon
content:
The latest version of WhatsApp for iOS is bringing a feature the company teased users about a week ago. Starting now, users will be able to participate in group voice calls with up to 32 participants. Here’s everything new with this update.

more…

The post WhatsApp for iOS now supports up to 32 participants group voice calls, reactions coming soon appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Starting now, WhatsApp users will be able to participate in group voice calls with up to 32 participants. Here’s everything new with it.
